## die flogenden Zeilen kannst du Ã¼berspringen. Weiter gehts in Zeile 68
files <- dir("~/Work/PragBat/raw_data2/")

raw_data <- data_frame()
for (f in files) {
  jf <- paste("~/Work/PragBat/raw_data2/",f,sep="")
  jd <- jsonlite::fromJSON(paste(readLines(jf), collapse=""))
  date <- str_sub(jf,34,str_length(jf)-11)
  id <- as_data_frame(jd$data$data) %>% mutate(test_date = date,
                                               trial = as.character(trial))
  raw_data <- bind_rows(raw_data, id)
}
